knimeNode.name: PMFX Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node writes primary and tertiary models to PMF files

fullDescription.intro:
This node writes models and data to a PMF file in disk. The generated PMF files support the following cases:
Experimental data
Primary model with data
Primary model without data
Two steps secondary model
One step secondary model
Manual secondary model
Two steps secondary model
One step secondary model
Manual secondary model
fullDescription.option: Path where the PMF is written into.
Specifies the name of the models in SBML and the filename. If you choose "Test" as model name, the models are named "Test_1", "Test_2", ...
If checked the model is considered secondary. Otherwise it is considered tertiary
If checked an existing model with the same name will be overwritten
If checked the top level models (secondary or tertiary models) will be saved into separated PMF files
